name: At Your Own Pace
description:
At Your Own Pace is my very first "completed" video game, made for 20 Second Game Jam. 

How to play?

Open the game, set the speed slider and start the game! You may have different experience depending on the initial speed setting , so make sure to experiment!  Sometimes you may have to spend more than 20 seconds to win the game! If at first or second try you still can't win, try going faster!
